initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Adecco helped with:
I have used ADDECO to find jobs and I would recommend it because it is an excellent search tool. It has job offers in all areas of work and that makes it a platform that recommends family and friends who are looking for work.

What do you like best about Adecco?
What I like most is the interface is very easy to use

What do you dislike about Adecco?
What I like the least is that I have to add a lot of information about previous jobs. It would be good to have some tab to upload your curriculum summary in PDF format

Recommendations to others considering Adecco:
My recommendation is that people who use ADDECO have patience and know how to select very well the jobs they really like and are prepared to take on such jobs.

Describe the project or task Adecco helped with:
They help us to find workers quickly, and they give us reporters about them

What do you like best about Adecco?
I think is the professionality and good service

What do you dislike about Adecco?
Sometimes they don't send us exactly the profile we are looking for

Recommendations to others considering Adecco:
Great professionals

What do you like best about Adecco?
Adecco is one of the best agency if you want to find job , i worked for them in past for few month for a Expo in Milan , they are great, good quality service, they help you in whatever you want, they are very kind and friendly , i think all the employers have to be like them , very precise and efficient.
In their web page you can find different jobs advertises , and you can also put your CV and they will send you an email every time that a job match with your experiences.
If they contract you they will pay you every month without problems.
They are one of the biggest agency for finding job i think.
I remember that compared with other agencies in the same project they paid us far more than them , like 200 or 300 euros more and our hours were less than their hours.


What do you dislike about Adecco?
Nothing in particular my experience with them was smooth and easy.
Maybe i would like to see more jobs in their web pages.

Recommendations to others considering Adecco:
Just go for it , at least in Italy they are very professional so you will feel good working with them.
